comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Two of their husbands: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2535981129/] Harriet B. Taggart Mack (d. 1954) daughter of Isaac Taggart of Buffalo NY, was married to Norman Edward Mack (1858-1932), a Buffalo newspaperman who served as chairman of the Democratic National Committee in 1908; Harriet was also active with the party for decades, and served as a delegate to various national conventions. www.buffaloah.com/a/forestL/mack/index.html politicalgraveyard.com/families/13642.html Thomas Taggart (1856-1929) was the Irish-born mayor of Indianapolis, and DNC chair: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Taggart More Tom Taggart in the Commons: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2949648770/]
